title: Introducing photography with a pinhole camera
creator_credit: Alexander Milsky and A M Productions
brief_description: A simple pinhole camera is designed and demonstrated. Developing and printing is shown. The use of different size cameras (boxes) are explained and demonstrated in animation.
description: A simple pinhole camera is designed and demonstrated. Developing and printing is shown. The use of different size cameras (boxes) are explained and demonstrated in animation.
